Usage: anyrepo init [OPTIONS]

  Initialize AnyRepo workspace and create all dependent git clones.

  The actual directory MUST be a valid git clone, which has been be either
  created by 'git init' or 'git clone'.

Options:
  -P, --project TEXT   Project path to operate on only. All by default. This
                       option can be specified multiple times.
  -M, --manifest FILE  Manifest file. 'anyrepo.toml' by default.
  --help               Show this message and exit.
